item.title: NBA legend Shaq wants to retire to The Villages in Florida: Here's why
item.description: Retired NBA legend and former FloridianShaquille O’Neal, 53,wants to retire to Ocala, Florida, for an eye-opening reason: The rumors about The Villages that have circulated among Floridians for years.

item.title: Who has the best college football stadium? We ranked the top 25
item.description: Talent and coaching will take you places in college football, but only so far. Thebest programs in the Bowl Subdivision playfor conference and national championships in part because of mesmerizing home-field advantages that have etched many Power Four and Group of Five venues into the very fabric of the sport.

item.title: Cognizant Classic will be stuck between four high-profile events in 2026
item.description: A shift in the calendar has helped the Cognizant Classic in the Palm Beaches boost its field the last two years.

item.title: VOTE for Sarasota-Manatee's all-time best state championship football team

item.title: First Amendment: What to know about Trump's lawsuit…
item.description: PresidentDonald Trump'slawsuit against the Wall Street Journal, filed in South Florida, raises potential First Amendment concerns regarding freedom of the press, speech and accountability.

item.title: Which lakes house the most snakes in Florida? Study…
item.description: Reptiles and Florida might as well be synonymous, especially when it comes to ourslithering neighbors.

item.title: Can you buy a car at Costco in Florida? Here’s what to…
item.description: You knowCostcohas stacks of bulk snacks, monster packages of cheap meat, discounted clothing, new glasses, lawn furniture, electronics and the best value for food court hot dogs and pizza anywhere. But what if you want to buy a car?

item.title: Florida law could allow WSJ to 'SLAPP' Donald Trump with attorney fees
item.description: A lawcentral to First Amendment protections in Florida may apply in a federal lawsuit fromPresident Donald Trumpagainst theWall Street Journal, which came after a report about a birthday letter from Trump to convicted sex offenderJeffrey Epstein.
